product_name: Sugoi Neo Bike Jersey - Men's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Zip up the warm Sugoi Neo bike jersey for men to help keep you charged up all day long on your cycling adventures. Double-knit fabric offers exceptional stretch and lightweight thermal protection. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps keep you dry on mild days. Full-length zipper lets you dump excess heat quickly; draft flap helps keeps cold air out. Bottleneck collar helps keep heat-thieving drafts from sneaking in. Three elasticized rear pockets expand to hold accessories and food-slanted sides allow easy access. Stretch cuffs and droptail hem with gripper elastic keep Sugoi Neo jersey in place. Semifitted design prevents flapping of fabric in the wind. Closeout.
short_description: Zip up the warm Sugoi Neo bike jersey for men to help keep you charged up all day long on your cycling adventures.
